amendment.description: Amendments sought to eliminate $20 million in funding for the electrometallurgical treatment program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, consisting of two amendments offered en bloc, to eliminate the $20 million in funds appropriated in the bill for continued research on a nuclear reprocessing procedure for nuclear waste known as pyroprocessing.

action.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendments (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 278 (Roll no. 359).
